data.text: @SenEricSchmitt America’s sons and daughters are being murdered by your party.  More white American men commit more murder than immigrants.  Look it up before trump tries to destroy the data.  And maybe read the fucking constitutional asshole

@SenEricSchmitt Wow! Look in the mirror, Pal. If there's anyone who "cares about power" it is you & all the MAGA fascists. ICE has attacked citizens & you want Americans to submit to a bunch of masked, armed, officers without legit warrants & then not provide due process. 
READ THE CONSTITUTION!

@SenEricSchmitt US citizens Mercy appeal....Section 301 g of Immigration and Nationality Act may be amended by bi-partisan bill to remove or reduce( to 3 years) of 5 years physical presence requirement in US because it is hindrance for US Citizens Parent to transmit US Citizenship to Children
@SenEricSchmitt You fucking nasty fuck. You are nothing but a racist nazi. Please go back to Germany and be locked up.
